---
title: "Useless spaces"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
    tufte::tufte_html: default
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tufte)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE, cache.extra = packageVersion('tufte'))
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
home <- Sys.getenv("HOME")
```

There is so much dead space in urban architecture - corners that are never occupied. Some of them, however useless they may be, are nonetheless capable of producing pleasing aesthetics, when the angle is right.

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(home, '/leondutoit.github.io/posts/media/useless1.jpg'))
```
